snippet: With the importance of jobs to Americans, many of whom have long been out of work, it's no wonder the monthly jobs report gets so much weight. But some experts, and some readers, think it gets too much emphasis, or the wrong kind.
abstract: With the importance of jobs to Americans, many of whom have long been out of work, it's no wonder the monthly jobs report gets so much weight. But some experts, and some readers, think it gets too much emphasis, or the wrong kind.

headline.main: The Trouble With Numbers: Complaints on a Much Anticipated Jobs Report
